description: This file defines a 'TopNav' component for a Recipe Explorer application using Lightning.js. It implements a top navigation bar with focus management, routing, and a SearchBar placeholder.

classes.name: TopNav
classes.description: A Lightning.js component implementing the top navigation bar, including menu items and focus/selection logic.

methods.name: $isFocused
methods.description: Returns true if a given index of navigation item is currently focused.

methods.name: setFocusIndex
methods.description: Updates the focus index, constrained within the range of navigation items.

methods.name: goActive
methods.description: Navigates to the route associated with the currently focused navigation item.
